title: "Because you abandoned a recent game in a champ selection..
body:
where 3 people called mid and all picked troll champions and said they were going to feed, you are now penalized and have to wait several minutes to queue again."


Who comes up with this stuff? lmao

What a joke.

replies.body:
If dodge penalties didn't exist then it would take forever to get a game to start. People would dodge for every single little thing. Someone didn't get their lane? dodge. Someones champ got banned? dodge. etc etc.

Yes it sucks to have a penalty because of something other people did, but it's the lesser of two evils and honestly, it's should easily be worth it to avoid a game with trolls.
I think its to stop troll's from entering and doging a game though that's just my take in it

So in an attempt to deal with trolls, they essentially empowered them. I am now penalized because there were trolls in champion select and they get to queue right up again.

Genius.

eghhhhh I also don't think its a perfect system but I can't think of one that could solve the other dilemma in 70 seconds, since imagine if you could report early but like you said 3 where troll's so only 2 would report and I don't think that would solve it aswell though I might just be blind and not able to see the better solution
